comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: These scissors now reside in the Legislative Assembly Lobby of NSW Parliament House, and have had a couple of official outings since 1932. The circles and ovals are actually black opals: www.parliament.nsw.gov.au/prod/PARLMENT/publications.nsf/... Spectacular colour photograph here: www.redbubble.com/people/blossom/art/2140804-3-the-sydney... Offical portrait here: www.parliament.nsw.gov.au/Prod/Web/common.nsf/cbe381f0817...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Thanks for adding these extra links about the scissors, lifeasdaddy. The colour photograph is spectacular!

comment.author: 63534784@N05
comment._content: My late grandfather Mr Norman Neal and his best friend, the late Mr Les Denham designed and made the scissors when they worked for Angus and Coote in 1932...not a bad piece of family history!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/63534784@N05] How wonderful! Thanks for sharing.

AB

comment.author: 12050670@N06
comment._content: Vambola Veinberg was the designer of the scissors. "Highly ornate, the scissors are decorated with flannel flowers, waratahs and gum leaves set around a model of the Bridge. Vambola Veinberg designed the original s, Les Denham embossed them and Norm Neal engraved them in Angus & Coote’s workrooms".

comment.author: 12050670@N06
comment._content: The designer of the scissors was an Estonian man Vambola Veinberg. www.pylonlookout.com.au/PylonLookoutMediaKit.pdf

comment.author: 12050670@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63534784@N05] Vambola Veinberg was the designer of the scissors. "Highly ornate, the scissors are decorated with flannel flowers, waratahs and gum leaves set around a model of the Bridge. Vambola Veinberg designed the original s, Les Denham embossed them and Norm Neal engraved them in Angus & Coote’s workrooms." www.pylonlookout.com.au/PylonLookoutMediaKit.pdf
